title: Fonts or Alternatives Needed - Please Help!!!
content:
I'm looking for the following fonts; either free or close alternatives that are free. The originals can be found at [http://www.sudtipos.com/fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013053205/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts "http://www.sudtipos.com/fonts").

Feel Script  
Almond Script  
Amorinda  
Angelus  
Biographer  
Brisa  
Cenizas  
Diplomatic  
Galgo Script  
Herencia  
Inoxida  
Matogrosso  
Milonguita  
Ministry Script  
Sinfonieta  
Tiza  
Mrs Von Eckley  
Her Von Mueller  
Mrs St Delafield  
Mr Donaldson

These are commercial fonts; I'm having trouble finding any alternatives that are anywhere close, or anyone willing to share. Any help at all would be greatly appreciated!!!
author: urbanaphrodite

comments.content:
And why do you think you will get help here, where the typedesigners live? And Alejandro Paul is a regular guest, too?

P.S.: You should read this article: [The value of type](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013053205/http:/www.letterror.com/content/value/index.html) by E. v. Blokland.
I'll second that. Show some respect, please!!!

You don’t need all those anyway. I find the process of looking for something specific to fit my task(s) almost as exciting as the design itself. Studying both online specimens and printed specimens, looking up opinions and reviews, all in order to get a feel for how the typeface will preform.

Or, you could just waste your hours surfing Dafont: we don’t really care.
